entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:24 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:24 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
